Detailed Description

Password component

Helps enforce our password policy

Copyright 2013 University of Washington, School of Nursing. http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause

PasswordComponent::resetPassword ( $  id  ) 

Reset a user's password to a temporary (random) password. This method does not check for authorization.

Returns:

Member Data Documentation

const PasswordComponent::STAFF_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH = 8

The minimum length of a Staff user's password

const PasswordComponent::NONSTAFF_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH = 6

The minimum length of a non-staff user's password

const PasswordComponent::STAFF_MIN_PASSWORD_CHARGROUPS = 3

The minimum number of distinct character groups (uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, other chars) in a staff user's password

const PasswordComponent::NONSTAFF_MIN_PASSWORD_CHARGROUPS = 2

The minimum number of distinct character groups in a non-staff user's password
